pkgmetadata.longdescription: Using 'ggplot2' Feature to Write Readable R Code for Circular Visualization // A wrapper for 'circlize'. All components are based on classes and objects. Users can use the addition symbol (+) to combine components for a circular visualization with 'ggplot2' style.The package is described in Zhang Z, Cao T, Huang Y and Xia Y (2025) doi:10.3389/fgene.2025.1535368.
